attributes.action: Discuss: the UK Government is unable to deal with the Climate Emergency.
attributes.additional_details:
We are facing catastrophic global problems and a devastating future says David Attenborough but government ministers dismiss public protest and effective action seems unlikely. https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/m00049b1/climate-change-the-facts
https://rebellion.earth/the-truth/demands/
attributes.background: A five year political term of office, the personal career ambitions of our MP's and concerns about damaging the economy means that effective action will be minimal and hence inadequate.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258464
